SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_CHILD_GETCHILDLOOKUPID
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_CHILD_GETCHILDLOOKUPID ( @sponsorshipOpportunityChildID uniqueidentifier, @includeProjectLookupID as bit = 0 ) returns nvarchar(200) with execute as caller as begin declare @childLookupID nvarchar(200) = '' declare @projectLookupID nvarchar(100) = ''
select @childLookupID = so.LOOKUPID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so where so.ID = @sponsorshipOpportunityChildID
if @includeProjectLookupID = 1 begin select @projectLookupID = proj_const.LOOKUPID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION slocation on so.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID = slocation.ID inner join dbo.CONSTITUENT proj_const on proj_const.ID = slocation.FIELDOFFICEID where so.ID = @sponsorshipOpportunityChildID
if @projectLookupID <> '' set @childLookupID = @projectLookupID + '-' + @childLookupID end
return @childLookupID end
